official_title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain machine tools that are the product of East Germany.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1992, the duty on certain machine tools that are products of East Germany.

titles.title: To reduce temporarily the rate of duty on certain machine tools that are the product of East Germany.
